structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Use of emblem or reflective tape restricted -- Exemption from requirement.

text.section: The slow-moving vehicle emblem shall be restricted to the uses specified herein and the use on any other type of vehicle or on other objects is prohibited.
The slow-moving vehicle emblem shall not be required on trailers or other drawn vehicles which do not obstruct the slow-moving vehicle emblem required on the towing vehicle.
Highway construction or maintenance vehicles and public utility vehicles shall not require slow-moving vehicle emblems when being guarded by flagmen or flares.
The use of slow-moving vehicle emblems or alternative reflective tape, as required under KRS 189.820, shall be in addition to any other reflective or lighting devices required by law.
The slow-moving vehicle emblem shall not be used on a bicycle.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 3, effective April 11, 2012. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 6. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 3.
